verbs.description: Donald Trump 's repatriation tax holiday [V: is] n't expected to be exploited for share buybacks to the same degree a similar measure was in 2004 .

[ARG1: Donald Trump 's repatriation tax holiday] is n't expected to be [V: exploited] [ARGM-PNC: for share buybacks] [ARG2: to the same degree a similar measure was in 2004] .
Donald Trump 's repatriation tax holiday is n't expected to be exploited for share buybacks to the same degree [ARG1: a similar measure] [V: was] [ARG2: in 2004] .
